text: Woah, there's a giant lizard on the track! Face to face with Godzilla then, mate!
I am the best driver because I believe that I am the best. Every driver needs to think like that.
Can we ask for 20 seconds? Stupid idiots.
context: Abu Dhabi 2024, sarcastically asking stewards for a harsher penalty

text: The only place that matters is first.
I'm pressing it 50 f***ing times before it opens!
I was never 'Mad Max.' I was just Max who was trying to get the best result for the team.
This is boring. I should have brought my pillow.
If you are not allowed to defend, what's racing about then?
GP2 engine, GP2! Are there two GPs?
context: Brazil 2023, mocking his engineer Gianpiero Lambiase when he accidentally pressed the wrong button

text: The biggest critic I have in my life is my dad, so everything else is just a breeze.
I've got a nut flying around my feet... I hope it's not from the steering column!
I want to win because I am the fastest out there, not by luck.
A little bit of pit stop training perhaps?
context: Spa 2023, suggesting an unnecessary stop just for fun because he was so far ahead

text: We are getting way too much info in the cockpit. Sometimes I switch off the display in my car!
I think you can improve on everything; you're never perfect.
If my mom had balls, she'd be my dad.
You could send the medical delegate to the stewards, maybe they can check if they are all okay.
